data.name: Sersi
data.description: Sersi copies her enemies' positive effects, and when her Eternal ally Ikaris is with her, also turns those effects against them!

starItems.name: Sersi
starItems.description: Sersi copies her enemies' positive effects, and when her Eternal ally Ikaris is with her, also turns those effects against them!

1.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target.

Gain an Assist from a random Ikaris ally.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
 > Instead, copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.
 > If Ikaris is an ally, flip all positive effects on the primary target to negative effects.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

2.description:

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect to a negative effect on the primary target.

Gain an Assist from a random Ikaris ally.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:
 > Instead, copy all positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.
 > If Ikaris is an ally, flip all positive effects on the primary target to negative effects.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

6.description:
Copy <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects to negative effects on the primary target.

Gain an Assist from a random Ikaris ally.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>:

1.nextUpgrade:
Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally to attack the primary target
Called ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally to attack the primary target. Called ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier for self and Ikaris ally

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally to attack the primary target. Called ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier for all other allies

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Call <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally to attack the primary target. Called ally gains +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade: Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to attack the primary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to attack the primary target. Called allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for called allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier for self and Ikaris ally
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier for all other allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> to the primary target.
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies to attack the primary target. Called allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for this attack.

Barrier self and Ikaris ally for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, Barrier all other allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris in <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect into a positive effect on self and all allies.

 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.
3.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and an ally Ikaris

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.
5.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to all enemies

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from self and all allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead, flip <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects into positive effects on self and all allies.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage. If Ikaris is an ally, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and an ally Ikaris.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and an ally Ikaris.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy <color=#fff568>Support</color> with the lowest Speed.

1.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health, clear all negative effects on this character + Heal self for <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

On Turn, if not stunned, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns then choose <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy that has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on that enemy, then apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>,  to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self and Ikaris allies

2.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health, clear all negative effects on this character + Heal self for <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

On Turn, if not stunned, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns then choose <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy that has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on that enemy, then apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. Ikaris allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, if Ikaris is an ally, Heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Focus for self and Ikaris allies
